name: UNFINISHED GAMES COLLECTION 2015-2018
description:
A collection of unfinished games, old and new!

This collection is, and will always be, free! But, don't be afraid to donate! Every cent helps!

The games included in this collection:

2HourJam 2, 2HourJam, AAAAA - The Mansion Tiny Crappy Version, AAAAA - The Mansion, AAAAA, As The Vinyl Spins, Baby Mario's Tiny Adventure, background generator, BWB / Dark Times, Cookie Clone, DDRampage, Dystopia City, doin it well, game i saw in a dream, Game wit matt, Heart Attack, home, i built the tower to god with motion remake, Ice Hockey 2 ODST, KILLER SUITE, lv, melon, Metroidvania that got changed into an underwater game right before i stopped making it, which is why the level design isnt bad, it isnt meant for it being underwater, Nighttime Tele, notice powerful plants, oh god, week 12 / Werq alpha, Platformer Roguelike, Please Shoot At Things, Robot, Rocket Time!, RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR, SMASH THE LIKE, Submerged, subway, Sweetie, Thumbs, ultra, Viewer, WARNING, and Western Vision.

Have fun, everybody!

All games made by me, Mew

Play my other games @ https://mew.itch.io
Listen to my music @ https://cthrn.bandcamp.com
Follow my twitter @rgbmew
